amendment.description: Amendment increases for the Lifespan Respite Care Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to ) increase funding for the Lifespan Respite Care Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 356 - 67 (Roll no. 269).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
